t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Will I lose myself in society if I continue to look like this?
Why stick out from the crowds? My magic makes me stick out from the new ones.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is what happens when an experiment fails or something.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This isn't a failed experiment. This is a blessing to all of Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Just look at me. It's not a blessing. I look terrible. How does the public think?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I really don't know how much longer I can live with this stupid hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The one responsible will pay dearly for this disgrace.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm amused that you're mad about it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even though it's humanoids who mostly resolve these problems, I've seen youkai-borns do it too.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You aren't going to enter the tower you see ahead of you. If you turn it off, they'll be sad.
